In England, in the seven days to 20 March, there were 31,236 new confirmed cases (55.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 13 March, there were 32,868 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 5% (1,632 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 25 March is 3,778,510 (6,712.9 cases per 100,000 population).
